name: Silent Kong
description:
You were always told to avoid the Donkey Kong Jungle at midnight, but you never knew why... until now. In this thrilling action-adventure game, award-winning actors such as Mark Wahlberg, Chris Pratt, and Tom Holland bring these long-known characters into a new, terrifying light. Will you survive the jungle?

WASD to move

RMB for flashlight

E to sacrifice peanut butter

Get to the gate after you've sacrificed them all to win the game!
